Translations.Text: tebarake-llezi nezzele-lfurkane `ala `abdihi liyekune lil`alemine nezira
ellezi lehu mulku-ssemavati vel'ardi velem yettehiz veledev velem yekul lehu serikun fi-lmulki vehaleka kulle sey'in fekadderahu takdira
vettehazu min dunihi alihetel la yahlukune sey'ev vehum yuhlekune vela yemlikune lienfusihim darrav vela nef`av vela yemlikune mevtev vela hayatev vela nusura
vekale-llezine keferu in haza illa ifkun-fterahu vee`anehu `aleyhi kavmun aharun. fekad cau zulmev vezura
vekalu esatiru-l'evveline-ktetebeha fehiye tumla `aleyhi bukratev veesila
kul enzelehu-llezi ya`lemu-ssirra fi-ssemavati vel'ard. innehu kane gafurar rahima
vekalu ma lihaze-rrasuli ye'kulu-tta`ame veyemsi fi-l'esvak. levla unzile ileyhi melekun feyekune me`ahu nezira
ev yulka ileyhi kenzun ev tekunu lehu cennetuy ye'kulu minha. vekale-zzalimune in tettebi`une illa raculem meshura
unzur keyfe darabu leke-l'emsale fedallu fela yesteti`une sebila
tebarake-llezi in sae ce`ale leke hayram min zalike cennatin tecri min tahtihe-l'enharu veyec`al leke kusura
bel kezzebu bissa`ati vea`tedna limen kezzebe bissa`ati se`ira
iza raethum mim mekanim be`idin semi`u leha tegayyuzav vezefira
veiza ulku minha mekanen dayyikam mukarranine de`av hunalike subura
la ted`u-lyevme suburav vahidev ved`u suburan kesira
kul ezalike hayrun em cennetu-lhuldi-lleti vu`ide-lmuttekun. kanet lehum cezaev vemesira
lehum fiha ma yesaune halidin. kane `ala rabbike va`dem mes'ula
veyevme yahsuruhum vema ya`budune min duni-llahi feyekulu eentum adleltum `ibadi haulai em hum dallu-ssebil
kalu subhaneke ma kane yembegi lena en nettehize min dunike min evliyae velakim metta`tehum veabaehum hatta nesu-zzikr. vekanu kavmem bura
fekad kezzebukum bima tekulune fema testeti`une sarfev vela nasra. vemey yazlim minkum nuzikhu `azaben kebira
vema erselna kableke mine-lmurseline illa innehum leye'kulune-tta`ame veyemsune fi-l'esvak. vece`alna ba`dakum liba`din fitneh. etasbirun. vekane rabbuke besira
vekale-llezine la yercune likaena levla unzile `aleyne-lmelaiketu ev nera rabbena. lekadi-stekberu fi enfusihim ve`atev `utuvven kebira
yevme yeravne-lmelaikete la busra yevmeizil lilmucrimine veyekulune hicram mahcura
vekadimna ila ma `amilu min `amelin fece`alnahu hebaem mensura
ashabu-lcenneti yevmeizin hayrum mustekarrav veahsenu mekila
veyevme tesekkaku-ssemau bilgamami venuzzile-lmelaiketu tenzila
elmulku yevmeizin-lhakku lirrahman. vekane yevmen `ale-lkafirine `asira
veyevme ye`addu-zzalimu `ala yedeyhi yekulu ya leyteni-ttehaztu me`a-rrasuli sebila
ya veyleta leyteni lem ettehiz fulanen halila
lekad edalleni `ani-zzikri ba`de iz caeni. vekane-sseytanu lil'insani hazula
vekale-rrasulu ya rabbi inne kavmi-ttehazu haze-lkur'ane mehcura
vekezalike ce`alna likulli nebiyyin `aduvvem mine-lmucrimin. vekefa birabbike hadiyev venesira
vekale-llezine keferu levla nuzzile `aleyhi-lkur'anu cumletev vahideh. kezalike linusebbite bihi fuadeke verattelnahu tertila
vela ye'tuneke bimeselin illa ci'nake bilhakki veahsene tefsira
ellezine yuhserune `ala vucuhihim ila cehenneme ulaike serrum mekanev veedallu sebila
velekad ateyna muse-lkitabe vece`alna me`ahu ehahu harune vezira
fekulne-zheba ile-lkavmi-llezine kezzebu biayatina. fedemmernahum tedmira
vekavme nuhil lemma kezzebu-rrusule agraknahum vece`alnahum linnasi ayeh. vea`tedna lizzalimine `azaben elima
ve`adev vesemude veashabe-rrassi vekurunem beyne zalike kesira
vekullen darabna lehu-l'emsal. vekullen tebberna tetbira
velekad etev `ale-lkaryeti-lleti umtirat metara-ssev'. efelem yekunu yeravneha. bel kanu la yercune nusura
veiza raevke iy yettehizuneke illa huzuva. ehaze-llezi be`ase-llahu rasua
in kade leyudilluna `an alihetina levla en saberna `aleyha. vesevfe ya`lemune hine yeravne-l`azabe men edallu sebila
era'eyte meni-ttehaze ilahehu hevah. efeente tekunu `aleyhi vekila
em tahsebu enne ekserahum yesme`une ev ya`kilun. in hum illa kel'en`ami bel hum edallu sebila
elem tera ila rabbike keyfe medde-zzill. velev sae lece`alehu sakina. summe ce`alne-ssemse `aleyhi delila
summe kabadnahu ileyna kabday yesira
vehuve-llezi ce`ale lekumu-lleyle libasev vennevme subatev vece`ale-nnehara nusura
vehuve-llezi ersele-rriyaha busram beyne yedey rahmetih. veenzelna mine-ssemai maen tahura
linuhyiye bihi beldetem meytev venuskiyehu mimma halakna en`amev veenasiyye kesira
velekad sarrafnahu beynehum liyezzekkeru. feeba ekseru-nnasi illa kufura
velev si'na lebe`asna fi kulli karyetin nezira
fela tuti`i-lkafirine vecahidhum bihi cihaden kebira
vehuve-llezi merace-lbahrayni haza `azbun furatuv vehaza milhun ucac. vece`ale beynehuma berzehav vehicram mahcura
vehuve-llezi haleka mine-lmai beseran fece`alehu nesebev vesihra. vekane rabbuke kadira
veya`budune min duni-llahi ma la yenfe`uhum vela yedurruhum. vekane-lkafiru `ala rabbihi zahira
vema erselnake illa mubessirav venezira
kul ma es'elukum `aleyhi min ecrin illa men sae ey yettehize ila rabbihi sebila
vetevekkel `ale-lhayyi-llezi la yemutu vesebbih bihamdih. vekefa bihi bizunubi `ibadihi habira
ellezi haleka-ssemavati vel'arda vema beynehuma fi sitteti eyyamin summe-steva `ale-l`ars. errahmanu fes'el bihi habira
veiza kile lehumu-scudu lirrahmani kalu veme-rrahman. enescudu lima te'muruna vezadehum nufura
tebarake-llezi ce`ale fi-ssemai burucev vece`ale fiha siracev vekameram munira
vehuve-llezi ce`ale-lleyle vennehara hilfetel limen erade ey yezzekkera ev erade sukura
ve`ibadu-rrahmani-llezine yemsune `ale-l'ardi hevnev veiza hatabehumu-lcahilune kalu selama
vellezine yebitune lirabbihim succedev vekiyama
vellezine yekulune rabbene-srif `anna `azabe cehennem. inne `azabeha kane garama
inneha saet mustekarrav vemukama
vellezine iza enfeku lem yusrifu velem yakturu vekane beyne zalike kavama
vellezine la yed`une me`a-llahi ilahen ahara vela yaktulune-nnefse-lleti harrame-llahu illa bilhakki vela yeznun. vemey yef`al zalike yelka esama
yuda`af lehu-l`azabu yevme-lkiyameti veyahlud fihi muhana
illa men tabe veamene ve`amile `amelen salihan feulaike yubeddilu-llahu seyyiatihim hasenat. vekane-llahu gafurar rahima
vemen tabe ve`amile salihan feinnehu yetubu ile-llahi metaba
vellezine la yeshedune-zzura veiza merru billagvi merru kirama
vellezine iza zukkiru biayati rabbihim lem yehirru `aleyha summev ve`umyana
vellezine yekulune rabbena heb lena min ezvacina vezurriyyatina kurrate a`yuniv vec`alna lilmuttekine imama
ulaike yuczevne-lgurfete bima saberu veyulekkavne fiha tehiyyetev veselama
halidine fiha. hasunet mustekarrav vemukama
kul ma ya`beu bikum rabbi levla du`aukum. fekad kezzebtum fesevfe yekunu lizama
